name: SKIBIDI: ESCAPE FROM TOILETS!
description:
SKIBIDI: ESCAPE FROM TOILETS

Is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS - they want to kill you! TV MANs - UNITE!

Immersive experience

Realistic graphics, minimal user interfaces and a gloomy atmosphere will ensure immersion in the game.

Cooperative

You are a TV MANs team that is up against dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS. They want to kill you, the only chance to survive and get out of creepy places is to act together and cover for each other!

Unique levels

There are many unique levels waiting for you, each with its own atmosphere and mystery. You can find a way out with your bright screen, which not only illuminates the way, but also helps with a bright flash in the fight against SKIBIDI TOILETS!

Updates

Many new locations will be added for free and regularly, and new mechanics will be introduced so that you can spend endless time in the game with your friends.
